name: rompers
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a single piece of clothing consisting of a top part and trousers worn by babies and very young children: They had a photo of me as a baby wearing yellow rompers. The designer unveiled a collection of baby rompers with fur trim. The baby was wearing a romper suit. Synonym
playsuit
Дарья Амосеева/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a single piece of clothing for adults that consists of a top part joined to short or long trousers : The new collection includes white and ecru trouser suits, rompers and cowl-necked dresses for the successful working woman. A romper can be tricky to wear if you don't want to look too young. How do you go to the loo in an all-in-one romper suit? Synonym
playsuit
More examplesFewer examplesShe picked out baby clothes from a rail of donated rompers.Pastel colours are no longer just associated with prams and romper suits.My parents bought us a baby romper with a little penguin on it.It was difficult trying to be flirtatious and confident while wearing a padded romper suit and trying to stay balanced on two fast moving planks.
